short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will help you to log work time.
Made by Robert Chen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
* It's only for Exosite *
You can use this extension to record your working hours, and it will help you to calculate your past working hours and salary.
